name: BC Coast Volume 1 West Vancouver Island
categories: BC Coast Volume 1 West Vancouver Island
description: Written by one of the definite kayaking guides for coastal BC, the book covers outer Vancouver Island coast from Port Hardy to Bamfield This volume is more than an update of the original, it's more complete and better organized. Contains how-to information, history, geography, ecology, and many new camping locations, including the latest BC Marine Trail information. Contains 23 detailed mapsheets and over 200 photographs.
